text:
Is there a way to block HubSpot search from crawling a certain part of a webpage:
like this?
add a wrapper div with class `hs-search-hidden`

sharing this idea related to the blog post date format and potential to improve page performance from our team <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Date-formatting-in-JS-callback-of-the-related-blog-posts-tag/idi-p/723719/highlight/true>
<@UV23JHEJY> a question, Do I need to add it to the footer? or does HubSpot automatically exclude headers and footers from indexing.
You need to manually add it to header and footer, they're not excluded automatically

Hey all! We're looking for more effective ways to gather developer feedback this year, and it's awesome to hear we have willing participants :smile:  As you've well surfaced, there are lots of partner-based efforts underway, which is awesome, but we really want to clear the path for dev-specific feedback. I can't share more yet, but I can assure you that we are actively planning to roll out more effective feedback surfaces in 2023.
